Title: Fullstack Developer Python
Synopsis: Django-based software that is planned to be used for all internal workflows: business processes and business logic, entities management.
Description:
Web/mobile application to help people lose weight. Connects doctors with patients and automates their interactions.
Various activities and challenges are on the desk: from building UI and collecting data to deployment management and data analysis and processing.
The application aims to have a wide range of integrations with various services and APIs, like marketing services, payment processing, etc. Despite start-up flexibility, no burning deadlines ahead.
Back-end System
Django-based software that is planned to be used for all internal workflows: business processes and business logic, entities management.
Marketing Website
Public-facing React-based web application that serves for in-take flow and attraction of new customers. The application uses Formsort as a form creation tool and allows to instantly build input tools for potential customers, e. g. servers, application forms etc.
Customer Portal
Native customer application. New member-facing software built using React Native that aims to deprecate legacy native experience."
Our customer is building the first direct-to-consumer telemedicine business within the healthcare ecosystem, aligning incentives for doctors, insurers, pharmaceutical companies, and consumers. Bleeding edge technologies are used for closing the gap in care for 175mm American adults in a $600bn market where Americans spend millions of dollars and do not lose millions of pounds. An international team of senior managers and engineers in mostly UTC-timezone
Your mission will be challenging but interesting: to develop a sophisticated end-to-end system, and drive adoption of modern methodologies like Scrum, TDD, and Continuous Integration within the team.
If you are excited about all aspects of modern engineering - writing great code, creating architectures, designing components, interacting with clients, and delivering the working system to production - then you are the kind of person we are looking for. If you enjoy freedom and responsibility, creative thinking, leading, and mentoring others, come join our team of world-class developers, QA engineers, DevOps engineers, architects, and managers.
Responsibilities:

In a few words - a lot of work, a little hands. Various tasks, including building APIs, integrations with services, collect and manage data, build UI and management tools, refactoring and optimisation of the code-base.
Team is very flexible on improvements and appreciates initiatives.
Requirements:
Currently, synchronous and monolithic Django-based application, but service-oriented domain which may lead to application decoupling, later. AWS is used as a primary infrastructure provider. 95% tests-coverage, code-linters and checkers, including typing.
Python, Django (production experience) is a must, SQL, Microservices, CI/CD
Fullstack with the knowledge of JS and /or any framework
Solid OOP, strong communication skills.
Good mid-level or Senior developer.
Able of working independently and be a key developer in a small team
We offer:
Competitive salary
Work on bleeding-edge projects on a team of experienced and motivated engineers
Flexible working hours
Health insurance, benefits package, company-sponsored conferences, vacations
Well-equipped office located in the center of the city
About us:
Grid Dynamics is a leading provider of technology consulting, agile co-creation, scalable engineering and data science services for Fortune 500 corporations undergoing digital transformation.
We work in close collaboration with our clients on digital transformation initiatives that span strategy consulting, early prototypes and enterprise-scale delivery of new digital platforms. We help organizations become more agile and create innovative digital products and experiences using deep expertise in emerging technology, top global engineering talent, lean software development practices, and high-performance product culture.
Headquartered in Silicon Valley with over 1,300 technologists located in engineering delivery centers throughout the US, Central and Eastern Europe, Grid Dynamics has architected and delivered some of the most extensive digital transformation programs in the retail, technology and financial sectors to help its clients win market share, shorten time to market and reduce costs of digital operations on a massive scale.
To learn more about Grid Dynamics, visit www.griddynamics.com, or follow us on Twitter @GridDynamics

Title: Software Development Manager
Synopsis: As a manager of the software engineering division, you will apply your knowledge of software architecture to manage software development tasks associated with…
Description:
Software Development Manager-2200084C

Applicants are required to read, write, and speak the following languages: English

Preferred Qualifications

About Us

The Supply Chain Cost Management, part of Supply Chain Management, helps organizations plan and track the profitability of their products through the global supply chain. The solution will help our customers create what-if product cost and profitability scenarios under different manufacture, buy, distribute scenarios. Our solution performs all the financial accounting for the all the supply chain transactions needed to buy, make, distribute, and sell products. The solution also provides analytics for tactical and strategic decisions towards better profitability.

We are an agile team singularly focused on helping our customers succeed. We encourage risk taking and seeking out innovative ways to design and implement software without being bound by what has been done before. You will be part of a team of really smart, motivated, and a diverse group of people and given the autonomy and support to do your best work. It is a dynamic and flexible workplace where you’ll belong, be encouraged, and be able to achieve your full potential, and beyond!

Your Role

A unique opportunity to recruit and build your own team of software developers from the ground up.

You and your team will build, test, performance tune, and deploy new features in Cost Management both to enhance existing product capabilities as well as new capabilities designed to address target markets around the world.

As a hands-on development manager, you will provide technical leadership to your development team while developing with the latest tools and technologies for cloud applications.

You will not only lead your team on everyday development activities but also provide support and mentoring for their growth in the team.

You will interact with product managers and liaise with leads from other development teams to collaborate and discover functional and technical solutions. You will also be responsible for one or more areas within the product.

You will be expected to provide a leadership role on various initiatives including addressing business critical customer issues.
As we integrate ML and AI capabilities for the next generation of Cost Management solutions, you will get an opportunity to be part of and be a driver of that exciting journey.

Skills

2+ years of experience leading software development teams
4+ years of hands-on software development experience in Java, REST, or other object-oriented technologies
Experienced in SQL, PL/SQL, and Oracle Database
Conversant with AI/ML platforms and technologies
Self-motivated with critical thinking and problem-solving skills
Experience working in an agile environment
Strong technical writing and verbal communication skills

Detailed Description and Job Requirements

Manage a team that designs, develops, troubleshoots and debugs software programs for databases, applications, tools, networks etc.

As a manager of the software engineering division, you will apply your knowledge of software architecture to manage software development tasks associated with developing, debugging or designing software applications, operating systems and databases according to provided design specifications. Build enhancements within an existing software architecture and occasionally suggest improvements to the architecture.

Leads a specialized area which may have diverse functional elements. Frequently interacts with supervisors and/or functional peer group managers. May interact with senior management. Demonstrated leadership and people management skills. Strong communication skills, analytical skills, thorough understanding of product development. BS degree or equivalent experience relevant to functional area. Typically one year of software engineering or related experience.

Oracle is an Affirmative Action-Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, protected veterans status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Title: Senior Software Developer with Autosar and Networking
Synopsis: 4-7+ years of overall software experience.Provide AutoSAR technical leadership and mentoring / guidance for other software engineers.
Description:
Project Description
Early stages of the Client's next Software Platform evolution development for new Fully Networked Vehicle (FNV) Electrical Architecture. The project is focused on the creation of the modern Software-Defined Vehicle digital infrastructure. Target Software Platform will operate in a variety of environments and is critical to:
Expand the use of industry adopted APIsSupport high-velocity application developmentEnable next-generation vehicle applications

Luxoft will provide core parts for Automotive Middleware around AUTOSAR (Classic and Adaptive), including networking, configuration, security, diagnostics, etc. Additionally, Luxoft will participate in the development of components for a virtual environment. This virtual environment will support the CI activities, including automated builds, virtual ECUs/Machines, and automated testing support.

Project management maturity must reach ASPICE level 3. It requires establishing transparent project execution monitoring and control. Each participant will be responsible for providing evidence of systematic and significant achievement of the defined process attributes.

In this position, you will be responsible for helping the FNV work streamlining, shaping the architecture and designs' vision, and assisting in the development and software verification process.
Responsibilities
As Senior engineer, you will work with the team to design, implement and verify software based on architecture and methodology. Therefore, you should have a deep understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and be comfortable working in a fast-paced, multi-tasking environment to deliver quality software to meet requirements.
Responsibilities:
Working with the SW team to design, develop, and configure the full stack of AutoSAR components.Act as AutoSAR Subject Matter Expert (SME) for programs during architectural definition, design, reviews, integration, and failure investigations.Provide AutoSAR technical leadership and mentoring / guidance for other software engineersBuild strong collaborative relationships with other functional disciplines within and outside the division
Skills
Must have
Bachelor/Masters degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or related technical areasYou have 3+ years of experience with embedded systems development4-7+ years of overall software experience3-5+ years networking experience: Ethernet and IP forwarding, control plane or management planeUnderstanding of at least some networking fundamentals and protocols (e.g., TCP/IP, QoS, DNS, AVB, VLAN, TSN, etc.)Linux kernel and drivers experience is a plusStrong in C/C++Experience using an RTOS (e.g., QNX, Embedded Linux)Exposure to standards - SGMII; AUTOSAR; IETF RFCs; IEEE 802.xKnowledge of Git and related toolsStrong written and verbal communicationExcellent teamwork and people skills
Nice to have
Understanding of hardware boards, layoutDevelopment experience in one or more areas of Linux/QNX device drivers, networking stack, network securityExperience with Ethernet link and IP layer troubleshootingWorking experience with vendor chips (e.g., NXP, TI, Broadcom, etc.) is a plus

Job Description

Intel is about so much more than hardware. We are building the best team in the world for developing cutting-edge software to pair with our industry-leading hardware products. We invite you to join our creative and flexible team as a
We invite you to join our creative and flexible team as a Build and Release Engineer. We are looking for an experienced Software Engineer in Packaging to create and test packages and installs for Intel's oneAPI toolkits.
This team is responsible for CI/CD, Packaging, Install, final validation and release of Intel oneAPI toolkits and other software products. The engineer works on the packaging and creating installers for oneAPI toolkits and its components using third-party and internally developed tools and delivering Intel SW products to all popular distribution channels with the utmost installation convenience and quality. In this role you will work on automation as part of the CI/CD system for Intel software products and product suites (like oneAPI toolkits). The system provides product packaging and validation capabilities. You will contribute into release process automation based on existing services written in Python and create new ones.
A part of the job consists in ensuring release process continuity via setting up these services in new lab location. You will be also dealing with CI/CD pipelines and internal infrastructure support.

Developing and validating test cases and test scripts for software application validation
Scripting and programming languages such as PowerShell, Bash, Perl, Python, etc.

Intermediate+ English

Description:
Software Development Manager-2200084C

Applicants are required to read, write, and speak the following languages: English

Preferred Qualifications

About Us

The Supply Chain Cost Management, part of Supply Chain Management, helps organizations plan and track the profitability of their products through the global supply chain. The solution will help our customers create what-if product cost and profitability scenarios under different manufacture, buy, distribute scenarios. Our solution performs all the financial accounting for the all the supply chain transactions needed to buy, make, distribute, and sell products. The solution also provides analytics for tactical and strategic decisions towards better profitability.

We are an agile team singularly focused on helping our customers succeed. We encourage risk taking and seeking out innovative ways to design and implement software without being bound by what has been done before. You will be part of a team of really smart, motivated, and a diverse group of people and given the autonomy and support to do your best work. It is a dynamic and flexible workplace where you’ll belong, be encouraged, and be able to achieve your full potential, and beyond!

Your Role

A unique opportunity to recruit and build your own team of software developers from the ground up.

You and your team will build, test, performance tune, and deploy new features in Cost Management both to enhance existing product capabilities as well as new capabilities designed to address target markets around the world.

As a hands-on development manager, you will provide technical leadership to your development team while developing with the latest tools and technologies for cloud applications.

You will not only lead your team on everyday development activities but also provide support and mentoring for their growth in the team.

You will interact with product managers and liaise with leads from other development teams to collaborate and discover functional and technical solutions. You will also be responsible for one or more areas within the product.

You will be expected to provide a leadership role on various initiatives including addressing business critical customer issues.
As we integrate ML and AI capabilities for the next generation of Cost Management solutions, you will get an opportunity to be part of and be a driver of that exciting journey.

Skills

2+ years of experience leading software development teams
4+ years of hands-on software development experience in Java, REST, or other object-oriented technologies
Experienced in SQL, PL/SQL, and Oracle Database
Conversant with AI/ML platforms and technologies
Self-motivated with critical thinking and problem-solving skills
Experience working in an agile environment
Strong technical writing and verbal communication skills

Detailed Description and Job Requirements

Manage a team that designs, develops, troubleshoots and debugs software programs for databases, applications, tools, networks etc.

As a manager of the software engineering division, you will apply your knowledge of software architecture to manage software development tasks associated with developing, debugging or designing software applications, operating systems and databases according to provided design specifications. Build enhancements within an existing software architecture and occasionally suggest improvements to the architecture.

Leads a specialized area which may have diverse functional elements. Frequently interacts with supervisors and/or functional peer group managers. May interact with senior management. Demonstrated leadership and people management skills. Strong communication skills, analytical skills, thorough understanding of product development. BS degree or equivalent experience relevant to functional area. Typically one year of software engineering or related experience.

Oracle is an Affirmative Action-Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, protected veterans status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Early stages of the Client's next Software Platform evolution development for new Fully Networked Vehicle (FNV) Electrical Architecture. Expand the use of industry adopted APIsSupport high-velocity application developmentEnable next-generation vehicle applications

Title: Software Engineer
Synopsis: 4 years of software engineering or related experience.Specify, design and implement minor changes to existing software architecture.
Description:
Software Engineer-220006M9

Applicants are required to read, write, and speak the following languages: English

Preferred Qualifications

About Us

The Supply Chain Cost Management, part of Supply Chain Management, helps organizations plan and track the profitability of their products through the supply chain. The solution will help our customers create what-if product cost and profitability scenarios under different manufacture, buy, distribute scenarios. Our solution performs all the financial accounting for the all the supply chain transactions needed to buy, make, distribute, and sell products. The solution also provides analytics for tactical and strategic decisions towards better profitability.

We are an agile team singularly focused on helping our customers succeed. We encourage risk taking and seeking out innovative ways to design and implement software without being bound by what has been done before. You will be part of a team of really smart, motivated, and a diverse group of people and given the autonomy and support to do your best work. It is a dynamic and flexible workplace where you’ll belong, be encouraged, and be able to achieve your full potential, and beyond!

Your Role

You will be responsible for designing, building, testing, performance tuning, and deploying new features in Cost Management both to enhance existing product capabilities as well as new capabilities designed to address target markets around the world. As a lead developer, you are expected to collaborate actively with our product managers and external teams to explore and discover solutions. You will also be responsible for one or more areas within the product and be expected to coach and guide other junior developers. You will work with the latest tools and technologies for building cloud applications. In this role, you will also learn about and work on the integration of Cost Management with other applications. You will also collaborate with the rest of the team in triaging and addressing business critical customer issues. You will build visualizations and reporting geared towards high performance while processing extremely high volumes of data to support real time analytics and decision making. As we integrate ML and AI capabilities for the next generation of Cost Management solutions, you will get an opportunity to be part of that exciting journey.

Skills

4+ years of software development experience in Java, REST, or other object-oriented technologies
2+ years of experience in SQL, PL/SQL, and Oracle Database
Conversant with AI/ML platforms and technologies
Experience in leading teams on projects and coaching team members is a plus
Self-motivated with critical thinking and problem-solving skills
Experience working in an agile environment
Strong technical writing and verbal communication skills
Remote working flexibility

Detailed Description and Job Requirements

Analyze, design develop, troubleshoot and debug software programs for commercial or end user applications. Writes code, completes programming and performs testing and debugging of applications.

As a member of the software engineering division, you will perform high-level design based on provided external specifications. Specify, design and implement minor changes to existing software architecture. Build highly complex enhancements and resolve complex bugs. Build and execute unit tests and unit plans. Review integration and regression test plans created by QA. Communicate with QA and porting engineering as necessary to discuss minor changes to product functionality and to ensure quality and consistency across specific products.

Duties and tasks are varied and complex needing independent judgment. Fully competent in own area of expertise. May have project lead role and or supervise lower level personnel. BS or MS degree or equivalent experience relevant to functional area. 4 years of software engineering or related experience.

Oracle is an Affirmative Action-Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, protected veterans status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Job: Product Development
Location: MX-MX,Mexico-Guadalajara/Zapopan
Job Type: Regular Employee Hire
Organization: Oracle

Title: Software QA Test Engineer
Synopsis: Experience in open source software engineering.6+ months of experience in software validation and testing.Maintains documentation of test results to assist in…
Description:
Job Description
Debugs software products using systematic tests to develop, apply, and maintain quality standards for company products. Develops, modifies, and executes software test plans, analyzes, and writes test standards and procedures. Maintains documentation of test results to assist in debugging and modification of software. Analyzes test results to ensure correct functionality, determines root causes of failures, and recommends corrective action. Consults with development engineers in resolution of problems. Provides feedback in preparation for technical appraisals of programming languages, systems, and computation software.
The Debugger and Embedded Software Products team is primary located in
Munich/Germany and we want to increase our team in Mexico. Our responsibility is the development of debuggers and embedded software development products being optimized for the Intel architectures. These debuggers and products are used to create applications for the next generation embedded devices, client computers and servers in conjunction with multiple platforms and operating systems.

Are you into tinkering and playing with hardware? Do you enjoy working with bleeding edge technology and braving the path forward? This role requires a good set of initiative and problem solving skills, on top of the technical qualifications.

We are searching for an Software QA test engineer with Bachelor or Master's degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering. As member of the Systems Integration Team you work on platform configuration and setup, validation and preparation for debug and trace tools development. Besides Intel architecture HW skills, you need experience in working with different operating systems like Windows and Linux and its variety of distributions.
Behavioral Traits:
Good team player and communication skills.
Self-education, self-organized and self-development.
Qualifications
You must possess the below minimum qualifications to be initially considered for this position. Preferred qualifications are in addition to the minimum requirements and are considered a plus factor in identifying top candidates.
Education:
Graduate from Software, Systems, Electronic Engineering, Computer Science or related fields.
Requirements listed would be obtained through a combination of industry-relevant job experience, internship experiences and or schoolwork/classes/research.
Minimum Qualifications:
6+ months of experience in software validation and testing.
3+ months of experience with Linux and Windows OS development environments.
3+ months of experience in using IDE (integrated development environment).
3+ months of experience with Software development in Python and/or C/C++ and/or Java.
Intermediate+ English language capability in SW scope.
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience with processor architecture (Intel architecture preferred).
Experience in using debuggers.
Experience in open source software engineering.
Experience in embedded SW specifics.
Inside this Business Group
Do you want to impact how thousands of software developers around the world use Intel platforms? Join the Developer Software Engineering (DSE) organization and work on the latest technology enabling compilers, debuggers, analyzers, libraries, and parallel runtimes. You will develop industry-leading software which abstracts and showcases Intel platforms, extracts peak performance, and amplifies Intel business through our Hardware and Software developer communities.

Title: Software Product DevOps Engineer
Synopsis: Our developers and software engineers work in all software layers, across multiple operating systems and platforms to enable cutting-edge solutions.
Description:
Job Description

Intel is about so much more than hardware. We are building the best team in the world for developing cutting-edge software to pair with our industry-leading hardware products. We invite you to join our creative and flexible team as a
We invite you to join our creative and flexible team as a Build and Release Engineer. We are looking for an experienced Software Engineer in Packaging to create and test packages and installs for Intel's oneAPI toolkits.
This team is responsible for CI/CD, Packaging, Install, final validation and release of Intel oneAPI toolkits and other software products. The engineer works on the packaging and creating installers for oneAPI toolkits and its components using third-party and internally developed tools and delivering Intel SW products to all popular distribution channels with the utmost installation convenience and quality. In this role you will work on automation as part of the CI/CD system for Intel software products and product suites (like oneAPI toolkits). The system provides product packaging and validation capabilities. You will contribute into release process automation based on existing services written in Python and create new ones.
A part of the job consists in ensuring release process continuity via setting up these services in new lab location. You will be also dealing with CI/CD pipelines and internal infrastructure support.
Qualifications
You must possess the below minimum qualifications to be initially considered for this position. Preferred qualifications are in addition to the minimum requirements and are considered a plus factor in identifying top candidates.
Requirements listed would be obtained through a combination of industry-relevant job experience, internship experiences and/or school work/classes/research.
Minimum Qualifications:
Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science or electrical engineering or computer engineering or related technical discipline (Profesional License may be required) with 3 years of experience in the following skills or 5+ years of experience without a Degree
Programming experience on Windows or Linux. (Windows + C# or C++ or Python) AND/OR (Linux + C++ or Python)
Developing and validating test cases and test scripts for software application validation
Scripting and programming languages such as PowerShell, Bash, Perl, Python, etc.
Understanding of SW architecture principles and approaches to design and development of reliable, scalable, and modular SW systems
Knowledge of DevOps concepts and successful examples of applying DevOps methods and practices; understanding of CI/CD principles
Git (GitHub) or other version controls systems
Analytical skills in debugging issues with CI/CD flow.
Intermediate+ English
Preferred Qualification:
Experience with packaging tools to build Windows, Linux or macOS installers (MSI, RPM, DEB, Conda, Nuget, DMG, offline installers)
C or/and C++ is a great PLUS
Experience with Ansible, test automation
Experience in API design and development
Remote work is an option to be analyzed after interviews with Manager
Inside this Business Group
Enable amazing computing experiences with Intel Software continues to shape the way people think about computing – across CPU, GPU, and FPGA architectures. Get your hands on new technology and collaborate with some of the smartest people in the business. Our developers and software engineers work in all software layers, across multiple operating systems and platforms to enable cutting-edge solutions. Ready to solve some of the most complex software challenges? Explore an impactful and innovative career in Software.
Work Model for this Role

This role is available as fully home-based and generally would require you to attend Intel sites only occasionally based on business need.

Title: Fullstack Developer Python
Synopsis: Django-based software that is planned to be used for all internal workflows: business processes and business logic, entities management.
Description:
Web/mobile application to help people lose weight. Connects doctors with patients and automates their interactions.
Various activities and challenges are on the desk: from building UI and collecting data to deployment management and data analysis and processing.
The application aims to have a wide range of integrations with various services and APIs, like marketing services, payment processing, etc. Despite start-up flexibility, no burning deadlines ahead.
Back-end System
Django-based software that is planned to be used for all internal workflows: business processes and business logic, entities management.
Marketing Website
Public-facing React-based web application that serves for in-take flow and attraction of new customers. The application uses Formsort as a form creation tool and allows to instantly build input tools for potential customers, e. g. servers, application forms etc.
Customer Portal
Native customer application. New member-facing software built using React Native that aims to deprecate legacy native experience."
Our customer is building the first direct-to-consumer telemedicine business within the healthcare ecosystem, aligning incentives for doctors, insurers, pharmaceutical companies, and consumers. Bleeding edge technologies are used for closing the gap in care for 175mm American adults in a $600bn market where Americans spend millions of dollars and do not lose millions of pounds. An international team of senior managers and engineers in mostly UTC-timezone

Title: Software Development Manager
Synopsis: As a manager of the software engineering division, you will apply your knowledge of software architecture to manage software development tasks associated with…
Description:
Software Development Manager-2200084C

Applicants are required to read, write, and speak the following languages: English

Preferred Qualifications

About Us

The Supply Chain Cost Management, part of Supply Chain Management, helps organizations plan and track the profitability of their products through the global supply chain. The solution will help our customers create what-if product cost and profitability scenarios under different manufacture, buy, distribute scenarios. Our solution performs all the financial accounting for the all the supply chain transactions needed to buy, make, distribute, and sell products. The solution also provides analytics for tactical and strategic decisions towards better profitability.

We are an agile team singularly focused on helping our customers succeed. We encourage risk taking and seeking out innovative ways to design and implement software without being bound by what has been done before. You will be part of a team of really smart, motivated, and a diverse group of people and given the autonomy and support to do your best work. It is a dynamic and flexible workplace where you’ll belong, be encouraged, and be able to achieve your full potential, and beyond!

Your Role

A unique opportunity to recruit and build your own team of software developers from the ground up.

You and your team will build, test, performance tune, and deploy new features in Cost Management both to enhance existing product capabilities as well as new capabilities designed to address target markets around the world.

As a hands-on development manager, you will provide technical leadership to your development team while developing with the latest tools and technologies for cloud applications.

You will not only lead your team on everyday development activities but also provide support and mentoring for their growth in the team.

You will interact with product managers and liaise with leads from other development teams to collaborate and discover functional and technical solutions. You will also be responsible for one or more areas within the product.

You will be expected to provide a leadership role on various initiatives including addressing business critical customer issues.
As we integrate ML and AI capabilities for the next generation of Cost Management solutions, you will get an opportunity to be part of and be a driver of that exciting journey.

Skills

2+ years of experience leading software development teams
4+ years of hands-on software development experience in Java, REST, or other object-oriented technologies
Experienced in SQL, PL/SQL, and Oracle Database
Conversant with AI/ML platforms and technologies
Self-motivated with critical thinking and problem-solving skills
Experience working in an agile environment
Strong technical writing and verbal communication skills

Detailed Description and Job Requirements

Manage a team that designs, develops, troubleshoots and debugs software programs for databases, applications, tools, networks etc.

As a manager of the software engineering division, you will apply your knowledge of software architecture to manage software development tasks associated with developing, debugging or designing software applications, operating systems and databases according to provided design specifications. Build enhancements within an existing software architecture and occasionally suggest improvements to the architecture.

Leads a specialized area which may have diverse functional elements. Frequently interacts with supervisors and/or functional peer group managers. May interact with senior management. Demonstrated leadership and people management skills. Strong communication skills, analytical skills, thorough understanding of product development. BS degree or equivalent experience relevant to functional area. Typically one year of software engineering or related experience.

These debuggers and products are used to create applications for the next generation embedded devices, client computers and servers in conjunction with multiple platforms and operating systems.

Are you into tinkering and playing with hardware? Do you enjoy working with bleeding edge technology and braving the path forward? This role requires a good set of initiative and problem solving skills, on top of the technical qualifications.

Title: Software Product DevOps Engineer
Synopsis: Our developers and software engineers work in all software layers, across multiple operating systems and platforms to enable cutting-edge solutions.
Description:
Job Description

Intel is about so much more than hardware. We are building the best team in the world for developing cutting-edge software to pair with our industry-leading hardware products. We invite you to join our creative and flexible team as a
We invite you to join our creative and flexible team as a Build and Release Engineer. We are looking for an experienced Software Engineer in Packaging to create and test packages and installs for Intel's oneAPI toolkits.
This team is responsible for CI/CD, Packaging, Install, final validation and release of Intel oneAPI toolkits and other software products. The engineer works on the packaging and creating installers for oneAPI toolkits and its components using third-party and internally developed tools and delivering Intel SW products to all popular distribution channels with the utmost installation convenience and quality. In this role you will work on automation as part of the CI/CD system for Intel software products and product suites (like oneAPI toolkits). The system provides product packaging and validation capabilities. You will contribute into release process automation based on existing services written in Python and create new ones.
A part of the job consists in ensuring release process continuity via setting up these services in new lab location. You will be also dealing with CI/CD pipelines and internal infrastructure support.
Qualifications
You must possess the below minimum qualifications to be initially considered for this position. Preferred qualifications are in addition to the minimum requirements and are considered a plus factor in identifying top candidates.
Requirements listed would be obtained through a combination of industry-relevant job experience, internship experiences and/or school work/classes/research.
Minimum Qualifications:
Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science or electrical engineering or computer engineering or related technical discipline (Profesional License may be required) with 3 years of experience in the following skills or 5+ years of experience without a Degree
Programming experience on Windows or Linux. (Windows + C# or C++ or Python) AND/OR (Linux + C++ or Python)
Developing and validating test cases and test scripts for software application validation
Scripting and programming languages such as PowerShell, Bash, Perl, Python, etc.
Understanding of SW architecture principles and approaches to design and development of reliable, scalable, and modular SW systems
Knowledge of DevOps concepts and successful examples of applying DevOps methods and practices; understanding of CI/CD principles
Git (GitHub) or other version controls systems
Analytical skills in debugging issues with CI/CD flow.
Intermediate+ English
Preferred Qualification:
Experience with packaging tools to build Windows, Linux or macOS installers (MSI, RPM, DEB, Conda, Nuget, DMG, offline installers)
C or/and C++ is a great PLUS
Experience with Ansible, test automation
Experience in API design and development
Remote work is an option to be analyzed after interviews with Manager
Inside this Business Group
Enable amazing computing experiences with Intel Software continues to shape the way people think about computing – across CPU, GPU, and FPGA architectures. Get your hands on new technology and collaborate with some of the smartest people in the business. Our developers and software engineers work in all software layers, across multiple operating systems and platforms to enable cutting-edge solutions. Ready to solve some of the most complex software challenges? Explore an impactful and innovative career in Software.
Work Model for this Role

This role is available as fully home-based and generally would require you to attend Intel sites only occasionally based on business need.

Description:
Software Development Manager-2200084C

Applicants are required to read, write, and speak the following languages: English

Preferred Qualifications

About Us

The Supply Chain Cost Management, part of Supply Chain Management, helps organizations plan and track the profitability of their products through the global supply chain. The solution will help our customers create what-if product cost and profitability scenarios under different manufacture, buy, distribute scenarios. Our solution performs all the financial accounting for the all the supply chain transactions needed to buy, make, distribute, and sell products. The solution also provides analytics for tactical and strategic decisions towards better profitability.

We are an agile team singularly focused on helping our customers succeed. We encourage risk taking and seeking out innovative ways to design and implement software without being bound by what has been done before. You will be part of a team of really smart, motivated, and a diverse group of people and given the autonomy and support to do your best work. It is a dynamic and flexible workplace where you’ll belong, be encouraged, and be able to achieve your full potential, and beyond!

Your Role

A unique opportunity to recruit and build your own team of software developers from the ground up.

You and your team will build, test, performance tune, and deploy new features in Cost Management both to enhance existing product capabilities as well as new capabilities designed to address target markets around the world.

As a hands-on development manager, you will provide technical leadership to your development team while developing with the latest tools and technologies for cloud applications.

You will not only lead your team on everyday development activities but also provide support and mentoring for their growth in the team.

You will interact with product managers and liaise with leads from other development teams to collaborate and discover functional and technical solutions. You will also be responsible for one or more areas within the product.

You will be expected to provide a leadership role on various initiatives including addressing business critical customer issues.
As we integrate ML and AI capabilities for the next generation of Cost Management solutions, you will get an opportunity to be part of and be a driver of that exciting journey.

2+ years of experience leading software development teams
4+ years of hands-on software development experience in Java, REST, or other object-oriented technologies
Experienced in SQL, PL/SQL, and Oracle Database
Conversant with AI/ML platforms and technologies
Self-motivated with critical thinking and problem-solving skills
Experience working in an agile environment
Strong technical writing and verbal communication skills

Detailed Description and Job Requirements

Manage a team that designs, develops, troubleshoots and debugs software programs for databases, applications, tools, networks etc.

As a manager of the software engineering division, you will apply your knowledge of software architecture to manage software development tasks associated with developing, debugging or designing software applications, operating systems and databases according to provided design specifications. Build enhancements within an existing software architecture and occasionally suggest improvements to the architecture.

Leads a specialized area which may have diverse functional elements. Frequently interacts with supervisors and/or functional peer group managers. May interact with senior management. Demonstrated leadership and people management skills. Strong communication skills, analytical skills, thorough understanding of product development. BS degree or equivalent experience relevant to functional area. Typically one year of software engineering or related experience.

Title: Front End Developer
Synopsis: Enjoys coding by hand as well as using frameworks; has worked with cross-disciplinary teams and enjoyed it; is full of ideas.
Description:
Empleos
Front End Developer

Front End Developer
Colima, Mexico
Vauxoo is a 100% Latin American software company where we work to provide the best software solutions. We have a young and dynamic team that combines different accents and styles to achieve great things. We are looking for talented, passionate and unconventional people who want to join our team.
We are looking for a developer who has a natural inkling to build business applications and interesting apps in order to improve our development model. You want to excel at software development and building amazing services for people.
Our ideal candidate:
Enjoys coding by hand as well as using frameworks; has worked with cross-disciplinary teams and enjoyed it; is full of ideas.
Must have skills:
HTML5
SASS
JavaScript
Bootstrap
CSS3
Proficient understanding of web markup.
Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS.
Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery.
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX.
Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, to be able to crop, resize, or perform small adjustments on an image. Familiarity with tools such as Gimp or Photoshop is a plus.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git / Mercurial / SVN.

BackboneJS
Python

GitHub user, with projects (Or any public VCS)
Unix/Linux platform knowledge

Responsabilities:
You develop apps/scripts/features that your team needs and users enjoy.
You work on a certain framework or existing apps.
You bring quality and real value to the projects you are involved in.
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
Build reusable code and libraries for future use.
Develop new user-facing features.
What we offer?
Monday to Friday work from home: 100% remote work.
Flexible hours: Opportunity to establish your own hours within the guidelines established by Vauxoo.
IMSS, bonuses and all Mexican law benefits.
Huge hours of JS and Python development.
Competitive pay, based on experience.
Possibility of growth within the company.
A great team of young & smart people in a friendly and open culture.
Perks:
Vauxoo Benefits: Free counseling, free monthly book at Book Club and some more things!.
Meetings to review performance for promotions.
Relocation assistance.
English class sponsorships and anything else you want to learn.
A day at Vauxoo:
At Vauxoo we carry open source culture deep in our hearts, we are open and we like to share our knowledge with others. We are not a conventional company, nor do we want to become one. The members of our team tend to have many roles and support each other regardless of the area in which they work. We like to do great things and we expect the same from you. We will make your Mondays less painful and your Fridays more rewarding. You will learn a lot and grow fast, which is just one of the many perks of being a Front End developer at Vauxoo.
